Policy_Text_EN: This policy covers damages to your vehicle due to accidents, theft, and natural disasters.
Policy_Text_FR: Cette police couvre les dommages à votre véhicule dus aux accidents, au vol et aux catastrophes naturelles.
Policy_Text_ES: Esta póliza cubre daños a su vehículo por accidentes, robos y desastres naturales.
Summarized_Text: Covers vehicle damages from accidents, theft, and disasters.

Policy_Text_EN: Comprehensive health insurance policy covering hospitalization and outpatient treatments.
Policy_Text_FR: Police d'assurance maladie complète couvrant l'hospitalisation et les traitements ambulatoires.
Policy_Text_ES: Póliza de seguro de salud integral que cubre hospitalización y tratamientos ambulatorios.
Summarized_Text: Health insurance covering hospitalization and outpatient care.

Policy_Text_EN: Home insurance protecting against fire, theft, and natural calamities.
Policy_Text_FR: Assurance habitation protégeant contre les incendies, le vol et les calamités naturelles.
Policy_Text_ES: Seguro de hogar que protege contra incendios, robos y calamidades naturales.
Summarized_Text: Home insurance for fire, theft, and natural disasters.

Policy_Text_EN: Travel insurance providing medical and trip cancellation coverage.
Policy_Text_FR: Assurance voyage offrant une couverture médicale et annulation de voyage.
Policy_Text_ES: Seguro de viaje que proporciona cobertura médica y cancelación de viaje.
Summarized_Text: Travel insurance with medical and trip cancellation coverage.

Policy_Text_EN: Life insurance ensuring financial security for your family.
Policy_Text_FR: Assurance vie garantissant la sécurité financière de votre famille.
Policy_Text_ES: Seguro de vida que garantiza la seguridad financiera de su familia.
Summarized_Text: Life insurance for financial security of dependents.

Policy_Text_EN: Business insurance covering property damage and liability risks.
Policy_Text_FR: Assurance entreprise couvrant les dommages matériels et les risques de responsabilité.
Policy_Text_ES: Seguro empresarial que cubre daños a la propiedad y riesgos de responsabilidad.
Summarized_Text: Business insurance covering property and liability risks.

Policy_Text_EN: Personal accident insurance offering coverage for disabilities.
Policy_Text_FR: Assurance accident personnel offrant une couverture pour les invalidités.
Policy_Text_ES: Seguro de accidentes personales que ofrece cobertura por discapacidades.
Summarized_Text: Personal accident insurance for disabilities.

Policy_Text_EN: Cyber insurance protecting against digital fraud and data breaches.
Policy_Text_FR: Assurance cyber protégeant contre la fraude numérique et les violations de données.
Policy_Text_ES: Seguro cibernético que protege contra fraudes digitales y violaciones de datos.
Summarized_Text: Cyber insurance against digital fraud and data breaches.

Policy_Text_EN: Pet insurance covering veterinary expenses for illnesses and accidents.
Policy_Text_FR: Assurance pour animaux couvrant les frais vétérinaires en cas de maladie et d'accident.
Policy_Text_ES: Seguro para mascotas que cubre gastos veterinarios por enfermedades y accidentes.
Summarized_Text: Pet insurance covering vet expenses.

Policy_Text_EN: Marine insurance covering losses related to ships and cargo.
Policy_Text_FR: Assurance maritime couvrant les pertes liées aux navires et au fret.
Policy_Text_ES: Seguro marítimo que cubre pérdidas relacionadas con barcos y carga.
Summarized_Text: Marine insurance for ship and cargo losses.
